title: Hyundai Kona Rated Top Small Diesel SUV by German Auto Magazine
text:
The Kona ranked first in an evaluation of four popular small diesel SUVs being sold in Europe in seven categories including driving dynamics, driving comfort and body, the magazine said early this week. It earned 503 points out of 750, the only model that scored more than 500 points.

Hyundai's Kona has been named the best small diesel SUV by German magazine Auto Bild.

The other three models were Dacia's Duster, Ford's EcoSport and Mazda's CX-3.

Auto Bild is one of three major automobile magazines in Germany and also popular across Europe.

The Kona sold 79,943 units in the European market in the first nine months of this year, already surpassing last year’s sales of 70,056 units.
description: Hyundai Kona Rated Top Small Diesel SUV by German Auto Magazine
